item.title: Binance Futures adjusts the settlement frequency of funding rates for multiple perpetual contractsBinance Futures announced that it will resume the following U-margin perpetual contract funding rate settlement frequency at 20:00 Beijing time on July 22, 2025, and adjust it to settlement every four hours. The contracts involved include: XTZUSDT, BROCCOLIF3BUSDT, MYXUSDT, MUSDT and ERAUSDT. [PANews]

item.title:
Huobi HTX and HTX DAO will jointly broadcast live: In-depth interpretation of the semi-annual report and jointly draw a blueprint for the second half of the yearOn July 22, according to official social media news, Huobi HTX will jointly host a live broadcast with HTX DAO at 19:00 today on the theme of "HTX Semi-Annual Report and Development Strategy Seminar for the Second Half of the Year." At that time, HTX DAO Core Builder Liu Ye will join hands with DaDa, Mao Maojie, Song, Michael, Qiu Rong, Big Cousin, Xiaozhi and other HTX DAO builders to jointly study the Huobi HTX semi-annual report and conduct a forward-looking outlook on the development blueprint for the second half of the year. This event will be broadcast live on Huobi, with massive airdrops, so stay tuned. Register for the live broadcast: https://t.co/pbCklx4bDz

item.title:
SpaceX moves $150 million in bitcoin after three-year dormancy: ArkhamOn Tuesday, Elon Musk's aerospace company SpaceX moved its crypto holdings for the first time in three years.
According to Arkham Intelligence data, SpaceX-linked wallet address "15oKQ…7Jf1G" moved 1,308 BTC ($150 million) to a new address "bc1q8…hartf."
This marks the company's first crypto transaction since June 10, 2022, a period during which the firm regularly sent multiple batches of about 1,200 BTC to Coinbase. Between May 25 and June 10, 2022, SpaceX transferred 17,314 BTC to the cryptocurrency exchange.
SpaceX did not officially announce the crypto transaction nor reveal the reason for moving the bitcoin. The Block has reached out to the company for comments.
Following the latest transaction, SpaceX currently holds 6,977 BTC, worth $825 million, according to Arkham. Tesla, another company owned by Musk, holds 11,509 BTC ($1.36 billion).
Last month, Arkham wrote on X that Tesla and SpaceX held over $2 billion in bitcoin, which was acquired at an average price of around $32,000. "Combined, Elon’s companies are up almost $1.5 BILLION on bitcoin," Arkham wrote.
Tuesday's Bitcoin movement from SpaceX coincides with accelerating mainstream adoption of bitcoin and crypto, significantly boosted by President Donald Trump's strong pro-crypto stance and recent advancements in crypto-friendly legislation. This trend has prompted numerous traditional finance firms to establish corporate bitcoin treasuries or launch crypto-infused services.
Meanwhile, Musk, a former close ally of Trump prior to their public fallout, recently announced the formation of the "America Party," a new political entity aiming to challenge the two-party system. Musk stated on X that his new party would support bitcoin. [Arkham Intelligence]

item.title: Data: Hong Kong virtual asset ETF today's transaction volume is about HK$46.9811 millionOn July 22, Hong Kong stock market data showed that as of the close, the transaction volume of all Hong Kong virtual asset ETFs today was approximately HK$46.9811 million. Note: All of the above virtual asset ETFs have Hong Kong dollar counters and US dollar counters, and only two of Hua Xia’s ETFs also have RMB counters. [PANews]

item.title: Binance: Beware of Order Fraud in P2P TransactionsBinance issued a security alert, warning users not to pay funds to canceled or expired orders. Binance pointed out that scammers are using canceled or expired orders, combined with pressure tactics, to trick buyers into paying for invalid orders. [Foresight News]

item.title: Ethereum Block Gas Limit Increased to 45 MillionThe Ethereum blockchain's block Gas limit has been increased to 45.00 million units, a 25% increase from the 36.00 million units set in February 2025. The Gas limit officially took effect at block number 22,968,004. This increase to 45.00 million is part of the Ethereum scaling roadmap, with validators aiming for a short-term goal of a 60.00 million Gas limit, and a long-term plan to achieve a 15.00 million Gas limit through the upcoming Fusaka hard fork and EIP-7935. To mitigate risks, developers have also introduced protective mechanisms such as EIP-7983, which sets the upper limit for Gas usage per transaction at 16.77 million units to prevent denial-of-service attacks and ensure network stability. (The Block) [Odaily Planet Daily News]

The investor's average ETH buying price was $3,437.00, and the exit price was $3,692.69. Previously, this investor had earned $7.41M by buying the dip in BTC and WBTC, and $3.697M by buying the dip in ETH. [Odaily]

item.title: BNB Chain Foundation Acquires TAG Data Labeling Platform CoinOn-chain data shows that the BNB Chain Foundation address purchased $25,000.00 worth of TAG tokens today. Tagger (TAG) is a data labeling platform on the BNB Chain that implements an automated business model for the AI data industry in a DeCorp model. Previously, Tagger was one of the winning projects in the USD1 competition held by World Liberty Financial, and received a strategic purchase of a total of $240,000.00 worth of TAG tokens from WLFI and BUILDon. Recently, Tagger announced that it will officially adopt the USD1 stablecoin issued by World Liberty Financial as the settlement method for Web 2 customer enterprise data orders. At the same time, Tagger also plans to distribute some real-time task rewards to data labelers on the platform in USD1 form in the future. Tagger will showcase the many advantages of the USD1 stablecoin payment system in real-world AI enterprise-level B2B settlement, such as real-time cross-border transfers, extremely low handling fees, conversion of DeFi revenue into business discounts, and collateralized lending facilities during the order settlement process. [Odaily]
